resources.string: Press the button for a delicious joke!
Looking up an awesome joke online...
Need an internet connection to look up jokes!

A simple app that, in its working, demonstrates some advanced concepts.
 
- When the button is pressed, a call is made to a Google Cloud Endpoint 
- The GCE fetches data from a Java library 
- The fetched data is passed on to the Android library as an Intent extra, and the library displays the joke in a new Activity
 
Developed as a part of the Android Developer Nanodegree
